ygData.subject: Re: Guild quests
ygData.msgSnippet: Nope, none here. It seems that quests for the minstrels of Norrath are anemic to say the least. Hopefully more will be developed soon. Berrillian Bard of the
ygData.messageBody:
Nope, none here. It seems that quests for the "minstrels" of Norrath are anemic to say the least. Hopefully more will be developed soon.

Berrillian
Bard of the 10th Circle
Realm of Tarew Marr


Mark Simmons
simtek@...
SimTek Computers - Merritt Island, FL
Computer Renaissance 30200 - Orlando, FL

----- Original Message -----
From: Glen Colby
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Sent: Wednesday, April 21, 1999 12:27 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Guild quests



Hello friends and fellow adventurers, my name is Talonstar, A not so numble bard from the dimension of E'ci. I have one question. Has anyone received a quest from the guildmaster (Caskin Marsheart) in freeport?
